timeline.body:
This is the ID used for both iron and broad bolt tip attaching, so update this var's name.
```suggestion
	public static final int FLETCHING_ATTACH_BOLT_TIPS_TO_IRON_BROAD_BOLT = 8473;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This is the ID used for both iron and broad bolt tip attaching, so update this var's name.

public static final int FLETCHING_ATTACH_BOLT_TIPS_TO_IRON_BROAD_BOLT = 8473;
